attributes.action: demand the resignation of Baroness Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Had an everyday member of the public been found to have employed an illegal immigrant, the full force of the law would not have been spared.

Baroness Scotland herself said to the Lords that "ignorance is no defence".

The law that she enforced should be applied in each and every case. 

Privilege and position should not make one immune to the laws of the country and she should not be made an exception.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
